title: Newyork Nagaram Lyrics Sillunu Oru Kadhal
stanzas:
[ newyork nagaram
urangum neram
thanimai adarndhadhu
paniyum padarndhadhu
kappal irangiye kaattrum
karaiyil nadandhadhu

naangu kannaadi suvargalukkulle
naanum mezhuguvarthiyum
thanimai thanimaiyo
kodumai kodumaiyo ] (2)

pechellaam thaalattu pola
ennai uranga vaikka nee illai.

dhinamum oru mutham thandhu
Kaalai coffee kodukka nee illai.

vizhiyil vizhum thoosi thannai
edukka nee ingu illai.

manadhil ezhum
kuzhappam thannai
theerkka nee ingae illai.

naan inge neeyum angae
indha thanimaiyil
nimishangal varusham
aanadheno ?

vaan inge neelam angae
indha uvamaikku
iruvarum vilakkam
aanadheno ?

naatkurippil nooru thadavai
undhan peyarai
ezhuthum en penaa

Jill endru bhoomi irundhum
indha tharunathil kulirkaalam
kodai aanadheno?

Vaa anbae neeyum vandhaal
sendhanal kooda panikkatti
pola maarumeâ€¦.
